marklogic.body:
Well being what these company's are and where they are the salary's are what they are. Why in god's name would anyone want to be a press operator. the noise the Heat the crappy pay. As for DOD or anything that requires a security clearance just say no... Well unless your looking for a job with the FBI... they get ton's of money and just kind of screw Off with it. Tutoring, ya.. you get paid only when your working.. So it's "piece work" never do piece work. it sucks and it's kind of like working in a sweat shop.
Yes, i'm spoiled.. I'm use to getting paid high and sitting in nice quite offices.
Yes these are jobs.. but they are crap jobs and crying about people not wanting them is delusional. No one in there right minds would.
